ai_analysis.summary: Payer has escalate_count=1 from previous uploads. Forcing REJECT per payer-based fraud tracking rules.
reasoning: Per system policy: second and subsequent uploads by same payer are automatically REJECTED
This overrides ML and AI scoring to enforce strict repeat customer fraud policy
